sen.j: 片岡 市蔵（かたおか いちぞう）は、歌舞伎役者の名跡。
sen.e: Ichizo KATAOKA is a myoseki (professional name) of kabuki actor.
Ichizo KATAOKA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor's professional name.
Ichizo KATAOKA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor's professional name.
Its yago (stage family name) is Matsushimaya (kabuki).
The stage family name is Matsushimaya.
sen.cmt: 原文には「（歌舞伎）」とありますが、リンク先の単語が抽出されるバグのようですので、訳出しておりません。
sen.e: The stage family name is Matsushimaya.
Its kamon (family crest) is Ichomaru.
The Jomon (family crest) is Icho no Maru (literally, Ginko in a circle).
sen.cmt: 原文には 「家紋」とありましたが、リンク先の単語のようです。ウェブで確認すると用語が「定紋」となっており、本来はこちらの用語を使用していると思われますので、こちらを訳出し、原文修正しました。
sen.e: The Jomon (family crest) is Icho no Maru (literally, Ginko in a circle).
(the first)
(the first)
(the first)
He was the third son of Tokuro FUJIKAWA, 1792 - 1862.
The first Ichizo KATAOKA (1792 - 1862) was the third son of Tokuro FUJIKAWA (藤川鐘九郎).
sen.cmt: 読み不明の漢字を補足し、表現を変えました。
sen.e: The first Ichizo KATAOKA (1792 - 1862) was the third son of Tokuro FUJIKAWA (藤川鐘九郎).

sen.j: のち片岡仁左衛門 (7代目)の門下。
sen.e: He later became a disciple of Nizaemon KATAOKA (the seventh).
He later became a disciple of Nizaemon KATAOKA (the seventh).
He later became a disciple of Nizaemon KATAOKA (the seventh).

sen.j: ？（竹田屋）→ 藤川鐘三郎（天満屋）→ 藤川鐘彌（天満屋）→ 初代片岡市蔵。
sen.e: ? (Takedaya) => Kanezaburo FUJIKAWA (Tenmaya) => Kaneya FUJIKAWA (Tenmaya) => the first Ichizo KATAOKA
From an actor (undefined, Takedaya) through Kanezaburo FUJIKAWA (Tenmaya), Kaneya FUJIKAWA (藤川鐘彌, Tenmaya), to the first Ichizo KATAOKA.

sen.j: 実父は絵師の亀屋吉兵衛、1851–1906。
sen.e: His father was a painter Kichibe KAMEYA, 1851 -1906.
The father of the third Ichizo KATAOKA (1851 -1906) was a painter Kichibe KAMEYA,.
The father of the third Ichizo KATAOKA (1851 -1906) was a painter Kichibe KAMEYA,.
